title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 January 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:46 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
01:06 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
01:26 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
01:46 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
02:32 <CIA-32> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r5a817bc / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/edituser.vm : XWIKI-7461: The user editing dialog from the administration should link to the full user profile for all users, not just the current user ...  
02:35 <@sdumitriu> cjd: Ping  
02:35 <@cjd> pong  
02:43 <@sdumitriu> You're using postgres, right?  
02:43 <@cjd> yes  
02:43 <@sdumitriu> Did you encounter any problems with non-ASCII chars?  
02:43 <@sdumitriu> Especially since the hibernate upgrade?  
02:44 <@cjd> hmm, I'm not sure if I did any testing on non-ascii since the upgrade  
02:47 <@cjd> testing...  
03:18 <@cjd> just tested by pasting a bunch of stuff from my spam folder into a wiki page, looks fine to me  
03:19 <@cjd> postgres 8.4

20:03 <helge> @sdumitriu: Hi Dumitriu, thans for helping with the invalid character error. Unfortunately, since I patched (class from "materialized\_clob" to "text") I can not view versions of previously existing Pages. I catalina.out I find this error:  
20:03 <helge> isDiff: Patch is inconsistent. Content and diff field are contradicting  
20:04 <helge> Can you advise? Thanks, helge  
20:04 <@sdumitriu> helge: Can you look in the hibernate.cfg.xml file and tell me what dialect are you using?  
20:05 <helge> @sdumitriu: <property name="dialect">org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect</property>  
20:35 <@sdumitriu> helge: One more question, is this a new install or an upgrade from an older version?  
20:42 <vmassol> has quit  
21:17 <CIA-32> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r9556286 / (2 files): XE-963: Improve the Profile breadcrumb to be more user friendly ...
